pages.text: Aurochs wander the plains of the Overworld. If TFC is installed, you can find Aurochs alongside Cows. $(br2)Aurochs can be tamed with their favorite foods and can have chests.
When tamed, they can carry up to 25 slots of items and can be milked. $(br2)Be careful, as they'll attack players on-sight unless they're crouched. $(br2)Aurochs enjoy the same foods as cows.
